intro: Nicolasia nitens var. nitens, commonly known as the slender nicotiana, is a herbaceous plant native to South America. It belongs to the nightshade family (Solanaceae) and is characterized by its slender, upright stems and small, tubular flowers. The plant typically grows in open, sunny habitats such as grasslands and disturbed soils. Its flowers are usually pink to purple in color and bloom during the summer months. The species is notable for its ornamental value and is sometimes cultivated in gardens for its delicate appearance.
